data.title: MY TURKISH COURSE : Lesson 32: reported Past Tense in Turkish
data.meta_description: The subject of this lesson is the " Reported Past Tense "-" belirsiz geçmiş zaman ", a form of simple past, commonly used in Tur...
data.text: There are many reasons to believe that Turkish language knowledge will become an asset for the future.Turkey is growing fast. This website intends to offer an easy and effective tool to those who want to approach this language. The lessons aim to covers almost all the grammar subjects and, through the associated audio,the every day language ranging from simple expressions to more formal register. I apologize if the style is "not academic" but hope it meets your demands.
